<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <script src="[https://cdn.tailwindcss.com](https://cdn.tailwindcss.com)"></script>
    <script src="[https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js)"></script>
    <link href="[https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css)" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* AJUSTES DARK MODE */
        body { background-color: #0f172a; font-family: 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; color: #cbd5e1; }
        
        /* Pestañas Dark */
        .tab-active { background-color: #0f172a; color: #2dd4bf; border: 1px solid #2dd4bf; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(45, 212, 191, 0.1); }
        .tab-inactive { background-color: #1e293b; color: #94a3b8; border: 1px solid #334155; }
        .tab-inactive:hover { background-color: #334155; color: #fff; }

        /* Tarjetas Dark */
        .card { background: #1e293b; border-radius: 0.75rem; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); border: 1px solid #334155; }
        
        /* Ajustes específicos para inputs y tablas en oscuro */
        input::placeholder { color: #64748b; }
        td { border-color: #334155 !important; }
        tr:hover td { background-color: rgba(45, 212, 191, 0.05); }

        /* Animaciones suaves */
        .fade-in { animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-in; }
        @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="pb-10 bg-slate-900">

    <nav class="bg-slate-950 text-white sticky top-0 z-50 shadow-lg border-b border-slate-800">

                        <h1 class="font-bold text-lg leading-tight text-white">FNEE Intelligence</h1>

                        <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-column"></i> Mercado
                    </button>
                    <button onclick="switchTab('comparator')" id="btn-comparator" class="tab-inactive px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 hover:text-white">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i> Comparador
                    </button>
                    <button onclick="switchTab('data')" id="btn-data" class="tab-inactive px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 hover:text-white">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-database"></i> Datos
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <main class="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 mt-8">
        
        <div id="view-dashboard" class="fade-in">
            <div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 mb-6">

                </div>
                <div class="card p-6">
                    <p class="text-slate-400 text-xs font-bold uppercase mb-1">Líder Crecimiento '24</p>
                    <h3 class="text-lg font-bold text-white truncate" id="kpi-top-grower-name">-</h3>
                    <p class="text-emerald-400 font-bold mt-1" id="kpi-top-grower-val">+0 GWh</p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mb-6">
                <div class="card lg:col-span-2 overflow-hidden flex flex-col h-[600px]">
                    <div class="p-4 border-b border-slate-700 bg-slate-950/50 flex justify-between items-center">
                        <h3 class="font-bold text-white"><i class="fa-solid fa-list mr-2"></i> Directorio de Empresas</h3>
                        <div class="relative">
                            <i class="fa-solid fa-search absolute left-3 top-3 text-slate-500 text-xs"></i>
                            <input type="text" id="search-input" placeholder="Buscar CIF o Nombre..." 
                                class="pl-8 pr-4 py-2 border border-slate-700 bg-slate-900 rounded-lg text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 outline-none w-64 text-white"
                                onkeyup="filterTable()">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="overflow-auto flex-1 bg-slate-900">
                        <table class="w-full text-sm text-left">
                            <thead class="text-xs text-slate-400 uppercase bg-slate-950 sticky top-0 z-10">
                                <tr>
                                    <th class="px-6 py-3 cursor-pointer" onclick="sortTable('cif')">CIF <i class="fa-solid fa-sort text-slate-600"></i></th>
                                    <th class="px-6 py-3 cursor-pointer" onclick="sortTable('name')">Razón Social <i class="fa-solid fa-sort text-slate-600"></i></th>
                                    <th class="px-6 py-3 text-right cursor-pointer" onclick="sortTable('sales2024')">Ventas '24 <i class="fa-solid fa-sort text-slate-600"></i></th>
                                    <th class="px-6 py-3 text-right">Trend ('23-'24)</th>
                                    <th class="px-6 py-3 text-center">Acción</th>
                                </tr>
                            </thead>
                            <tbody id="companies-table-body" class="divide-y divide-slate-800 text-slate-300">
                                </tbody>
                        </table>
                    </div>
                    <div class="p-2 bg-slate-950 border-t border-slate-700 text-center text-xs text-slate-500">
                        Mostrando las primeras 200 coincidencias por rendimiento
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="card p-4 flex flex-col">
                    <h3 class="font-bold text-white mb-4 text-sm">Volumen Total Mercado (GWh)</h3>
                    <div class="flex-1 relative">
                        <canvas id="marketChart"></canvas>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mt-4 p-3 bg-slate-900 border border-slate-700 rounded text-xs text-slate-400">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-info-circle mr-1 text-blue-400"></i> Evolución agregada de las ventas declaradas.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div id="view-comparator" class="hidden fade-in">
            <div class="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 h-[80vh]">
                <div class="lg:col-span-1 flex flex-col gap-4">
                    <div class="card p-5">
                        <h3 class="font-bold text-white mb-4 text-sm uppercase">1. Añadir Competidores</h3>
                        <div class="relative mb-2">
                            <input type="text" id="comp-search" placeholder="Escribe para buscar..." 
                                class="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-slate-700 bg-slate-900 rounded-lg text-sm outline-none focus:border-emerald-500 text-white"
                                onkeyup="searchCompetitor()">
                            <div id="comp-results" class="hidden absolute z-20 w-full mt-1 bg-slate-800 border border-slate-600 rounded-lg shadow-xl max-h-48 overflow-y-auto text-slate-300"></div>
                        </div>
                        <div id="selected-comps" class="space-y-2 mt-4 min-h-[100px]">
                            <p class="text-xs text-slate-500 italic text-center mt-4">Máximo 5 empresas</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="card p-5">
                        <h3 class="font-bold text-white mb-4 text-sm uppercase">2. Visualización</h3>
                        <button onclick="setChartMode('absolute')" class="w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded mb-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50" id="mode-abs">
                            <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-bar mr-2"></i> Volumen Real (GWh)
                        </button>
                        <button onclick="setChartMode('indexed')" class="w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded text-sm font-medium transition-colors bg-slate-900 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-800" id="mode-idx">
                            <i class="fa-solid fa-arrow-trend-up mr-2"></i> Base 100 (Crecimiento)
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="lg:col-span-3 card p-6 flex flex-col">
                    <h3 class="font-bold text-white mb-2">Comparativa Estratégica</h3>
                    <div class="flex-1 relative">
                        <canvas id="comparatorChart"></canvas>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mt-4 overflow-x-auto">
                        <table class="w-full text-sm text-left border border-slate-700 rounded text-slate-300">
                            <thead class="bg-slate-900 text-slate-400 uppercase text-xs">
                                <tr>
                                    <th class="px-4 py-2">Empresa</th>
                                    <th class="px-4 py-2 text-right">2020</th>
                                    <th class="px-4 py-2 text-right">2024</th>
                                    <th class="px-4 py-2 text-right">CAGR (4y)</th>
                                    <th class="px-4 py-2 text-right">Crecimiento Total</th>
                                </tr>
                            </thead>
                            <tbody id="comp-table-body" class="divide-y divide-slate-700 bg-slate-800"></tbody>
                        </table>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div id="view-data" class="hidden fade-in">
            <div class="max-w-2xl mx-auto mt-10">
                <div class="card p-10 border-dashed border-2 border-slate-600 hover:border-emerald-500 transition-colors text-center cursor-pointer bg-slate-800"
                     id="drop-zone">
                    <div class="bg-slate-900 w-16 h-16 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4 text-emerald-500 border border-slate-700">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-cloud-upload-alt text-2xl"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold text-white">Motor de Ingesta de Datos</h3>
                    <p class="text-slate-400 mt-2 text-sm">Arrastra aquí tus archivos CSV (2019-2024).</p>
                    <p class="text-xs text-slate-500 mt-1">El sistema detectará el año por el nombre del archivo.</p>
                    <input type="file" id="file-input" multiple class="hidden" accept=".csv,.txt">
                    <button onclick="document.getElementById('file-input').click()" class="mt-6 bg-emerald-600 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-emerald-500">
                        Seleccionar Archivos
                    </button>
                </div>
                <div id="file-list" class="mt-6 space-y-2 text-slate-300"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

    </main>

    <div id="modal" class="fixed inset-0 bg-slate-950/80 z-[100] hidden flex items-center justify-center p-4 backdrop-blur-sm">
        <div class="bg-slate-800 rounded-xl shadow-2xl w-full max-w-4xl overflow-hidden border border-slate-700 animate-in fade-in zoom-in duration-200">
            <div class="bg-slate-900 p-6 flex justify-between items-start text-white border-b border-slate-700">
                <div>
                    <span class="bg-slate-700 text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded font-mono text-emerald-400" id="modal-cif">CIF</span>
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-bold mt-2" id="modal-name">Nombre Empresa</h2>
                </div>
                <button onclick="closeModal()" class="text-slate-400 hover:text-white"><i class="fa-solid fa-times text-xl"></i></button>
            </div>
            <div class="p-6">
                <div class="grid grid-cols-4 gap-4 mb-6">
                    <div class="p-4 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700">
                        <p class="text-xs text-slate-500">Ventas 2024</p>
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold text-white" id="modal-sales-24">0</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="p-4 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700">
                        <p class="text-xs text-slate-500">Crecimiento ('20-'24)</p>
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold text-white" id="modal-growth">0%</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="p-4 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700">
                        <p class="text-xs text-slate-500">CAGR</p>
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold text-emerald-400" id="modal-cagr">0%</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="p-4 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700">
                        <p class="text-xs text-slate-500">Coste Est. FNEE</p>
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold text-blue-400" id="modal-cost">0€</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="h-80">
                    <canvas id="modalChart"></canvas>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Configuración Gráfica Dark Mode
        Chart.defaults.color = '#94a3b8';
        Chart.defaults.borderColor = '#334155';

        // --- 1. DATOS PRECARGADOS ---
        let DB = [
            { cif: "A81948077", name: "ENDESA ENERGÍA S.A.U.", sales: { 2019: 96136, 2020: 85210, 2021: 75390, 2022: 78328, 2023: 75390, 2024: 68500 } },
            { cif: "A80298896", name: "CEPSA COMERCIAL PETROLEO, S.A.U.", sales: { 2019: 87767, 2020: 71631, 2021: 71796, 2022: 75500, 2023: 74000, 2024: 73200 } },
            { cif: "A95758389", name: "IBERDROLA CLIENTES, S.A.U.", sales: { 2019: 56083, 2020: 51557, 2021: 51557, 2022: 42000, 2023: 39293, 2024: 46500 } },
            { cif: "A61797536", name: "NATURGY IBERIA S.A.", sales: { 2019: 42699, 2020: 30751, 2021: 23978, 2022: 22388, 2023: 21500, 2024: 20100 } },
            { cif: "A28559573", name: "GALP ENERGÍA ESPAÑA, S.A.U.", sales: { 2019: 36467, 2020: 23744, 2021: 22253, 2022: 24500, 2023: 25100, 2024: 26000 } },
            { cif: "A80298839", name: "REPSOL PRODUCTOS PETROLIFEROS", sales: { 2019: 11748, 2020: 119846, 2021: 194426, 2022: 185000, 2023: 175000, 2024: 170000 } },
            { cif: "A28135846", name: "BP OIL ESPAÑA, S.A.U.", sales: { 2019: 41080, 2020: 34795, 2021: 39293, 2022: 38000, 2023: 37500, 2024: 36000 } },
            { cif: "B82846825", name: "ENERGIA XXI (ENDESA REF)", sales: { 2019: 13261, 2020: 12968, 2021: 12673, 2022: 12673, 2023: 12400, 2024: 12300 } },
            { cif: "A95000295", name: "TOTALENERGIES CLIENTES, S.A.U.", sales: { 2019: 13310, 2020: 14518, 2021: 23543, 2022: 23543, 2023: 25000, 2024: 26500 } },
            { cif: "A62338827", name: "AUDAX RENOVABLES, S.A.", sales: { 2019: 1677, 2020: 1675, 2021: 1725, 2022: 1800, 2023: 1950, 2024: 2100 } },
            { cif: "B85228138", name: "FORTIA ENERGIA S.L.", sales: { 2019: 7629, 2020: 5763, 2021: 4722, 2022: 5100, 2023: 5300, 2024: 5500 } },
            { cif: "B31737422", name: "ACCIONA GREEN ENERGY", sales: { 2019: 5654, 2020: 4992, 2021: 6349, 2022: 6500, 2023: 6700, 2024: 6900 } },
            { cif: "B83160994", name: "AXPO IBERIA S.L.", sales: { 2019: 7404, 2020: 14727, 2021: 12969, 2022: 14727, 2023: 10500, 2024: 10000 } },
            { cif: "A85908036", name: "FENIE ENERGIA, S.A.", sales: { 2019: 3949, 2020: 2476, 2021: 2127, 2022: 2127, 2023: 2000, 2024: 1950 } },
            { cif: "B88181441", name: "ELECTRICIDAD ELEIA S.L.", sales: { 2019: 2.9, 2020: 204, 2021: 204, 2022: 473, 2023: 500, 2024: 550 } },
            { cif: "B98670003", name: "ENERGÍA COLECTIVA, S.L.", sales: { 2019: 97, 2020: 180, 2021: 264, 2022: 264, 2023: 350, 2024: 380 } }
        ];

        const YEARS = [2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024];
        let marketChartInstance = null;
        let comparatorChartInstance = null;
        let modalChartInstance = null;
        let selectedCompetitors = [];
        let comparatorMode = 'absolute';

        // --- FUNCIONES ---
        const fmtNum = (n) => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n);
        const fmtEur = (n) => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { style: 'currency', currency: 'EUR', maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n);
        const calcCAGR = (start, end, periods) => (start > 0 && periods > 0) ? ((Math.pow(end / start, 1 / periods) - 1) * 100).toFixed(2) : 0;

        function switchTab(tabId) {
            ['dashboard', 'comparator', 'data'].forEach(t => {
                document.getElementById('view-' + t).classList.add('hidden');
                document.getElementById('btn-' + t).className = 'tab-inactive px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 cursor-pointer';
            });
            document.getElementById('view-' + tabId).classList.remove('hidden');
            document.getElementById('btn-' + tabId).className = 'tab-active px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 cursor-default';
            
            if(tabId === 'comparator') updateComparatorChart();
        }

        function renderDashboard() {
            let totalSales2024 = 0;
            let totalSales2023 = 0;
            let topGrower = { name: '-', growth: -Infinity };

            DB.forEach(c => {
                const s24 = c.sales[2024] || 0;
                const s23 = c.sales[2023] || 0;
                totalSales2024 += s24;
                totalSales2023 += s23;
                const growth = s24 - s23;
                if (growth > topGrower.growth) topGrower = { name: c.name, growth: growth };
            });

            document.getElementById('kpi-total-companies').innerText = DB.length;
            document.getElementById('kpi-total-sales').innerText = fmtNum(totalSales2024) + ' GWh';
            document.getElementById('kpi-total-cost').innerText = fmtEur(totalSales2024 * 239000).slice(0,-2) + ' M€';
            document.getElementById('kpi-top-grower-name').innerText = topGrower.name;
            document.getElementById('kpi-top-grower-val').innerText = '+' + fmtNum(topGrower.growth) + ' GWh';

            renderTable(DB);
            renderMarketChart();
        }

        function renderTable(data) {
            const tbody = document.getElementById('companies-table-body');
            tbody.innerHTML = '';
            const sorted = [...data].sort((a,b) => (b.sales[2024]||0) - (a.sales[2024]||0)).slice(0, 200);

            sorted.forEach(c => {
                const s24 = c.sales[2024] || 0;
                const s23 = c.sales[2023] || 0;
                const trend = s23 > 0 ? ((s24 - s23)/s23 * 100).toFixed(1) : 0;
                const trendColor = trend >= 0 ? 'text-emerald-400' : 'text-rose-400';
                
                const row = `
                    <tr class="hover:bg-slate-800 transition-colors border-b border-slate-800">
                        <td class="px-6 py-3 font-mono text-xs text-slate-500">${c.cif}</td>
                        <td class="px-6 py-3 font-medium text-white truncate max-w-xs" title="${c.name}">${c.name}</td>
                        <td class="px-6 py-3 text-right font-bold text-slate-300">${fmtNum(s24)}</td>
                        <td class="px-6 py-3 text-right font-bold text-xs ${trendColor}">${trend > 0 ? '+' : ''}${trend}%</td>
                        <td class="px-6 py-3 text-center">
                            <button onclick="openModal('${c.cif}')" class="text-blue-400 hover:bg-slate-700 p-2 rounded transition">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-eye"></i>
                            </button>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                `;
                tbody.innerHTML += row;
            });
        }

        function renderMarketChart() {
            const ctx = document.getElementById('marketChart').getContext('2d');
            const totals = YEARS.map(y => DB.reduce((sum, c) => sum + (c.sales[y]||0), 0));

            if(marketChartInstance) marketChartInstance.destroy();

            marketChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'bar',
                data: {
                    labels: YEARS,
                    datasets: [{
                        label: 'Volumen Total (GWh)',
                        data: totals,
                        backgroundColor: '#2dd4bf',
                        borderRadius: 4
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false,
                    plugins: { legend: { display: false } },
                    scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true } }
                }
            });
        }

        function filterTable() {
            const term = document.getElementById('search-input').value.toLowerCase();
            const filtered = DB.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) || c.cif.toLowerCase().includes(term));
            renderTable(filtered);
        }

        // --- COMPARADOR ---
        function searchCompetitor() {
            const term = document.getElementById('comp-search').value.toLowerCase();
            const resultsDiv = document.getElementById('comp-results');
            resultsDiv.innerHTML = '';
            
            if(term.length < 2) { resultsDiv.classList.add('hidden'); return; }

            const matches = DB.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) && !selectedCompetitors.includes(c.cif)).slice(0, 10);
            
            if(matches.length > 0) {
                resultsDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
                matches.forEach(c => {
                    const div = document.createElement('div');
                    div.className = 'p-3 hover:bg-slate-700 cursor-pointer text-xs border-b border-slate-700 text-slate-300';
                    div.innerHTML = `<strong>${c.name}</strong> <span class="text-slate-500">(${c.cif})</span>`;
                    div.onclick = () => addCompetitor(c.cif);
                    resultsDiv.appendChild(div);
                });
            } else {
                resultsDiv.classList.add('hidden');
            }
        }

        function addCompetitor(cif) {
            if(selectedCompetitors.length >= 5) { alert("Máximo 5 competidores"); return; }
            selectedCompetitors.push(cif);
            document.getElementById('comp-search').value = '';
            document.getElementById('comp-results').classList.add('hidden');
            renderSelectedChips();
            updateComparatorChart();
        }

        function removeCompetitor(cif) {
            selectedCompetitors = selectedCompetitors.filter(c => c !== cif);
            renderSelectedChips();
            updateComparatorChart();
        }

        function renderSelectedChips() {
            const container = document.getElementById('selected-comps');
            container.innerHTML = '';
            const colors = ['#3b82f6', '#ec4899', '#22c55e', '#f97316', '#8b5cf6'];
            
            selectedCompetitors.forEach((cif, idx) => {
                const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.className = 'flex items-center justify-between p-2 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700 text-xs text-white';
                div.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="flex items-center gap-2 overflow-hidden">
                        <div class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full flex-shrink-0" style="background:${colors[idx]}"></div>
                        <span class="font-bold truncate">${comp.name}</span>
                    </div>
                    <button onclick="removeCompetitor('${cif}')" class="text-slate-500 hover:text-rose-500"><i class="fa-solid fa-times"></i></button>
                `;
                container.appendChild(div);
            });
        }

        function setChartMode(mode) {
            comparatorMode = mode;
            document.getElementById('mode-abs').className = mode === 'absolute' ? 'w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded mb-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50' : 'w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded mb-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors bg-slate-800 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-700';
            document.getElementById('mode-idx').className = mode === 'indexed' ? 'w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded text-sm font-medium transition-colors bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50' : 'w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded text-sm font-medium transition-colors bg-slate-800 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-700';
            updateComparatorChart();
        }

        function updateComparatorChart() {
            const ctx = document.getElementById('comparatorChart').getContext('2d');
            const colors = ['#3b82f6', '#ec4899', '#22c55e', '#f97316', '#8b5cf6'];
            
            const datasets = selectedCompetitors.map((cif, idx) => {
                const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
                let data = YEARS.map(y => comp.sales[y] || 0);
                
                if (comparatorMode === 'indexed') {
                    const base = data[0] || 1; 
                    data = data.map(v => (v/base)*100);
                }

                return {
                    label: comp.name,
                    data: data,
                    borderColor: colors[idx],
                    backgroundColor: colors[idx],
                    borderWidth: 2,
                    tension: 0.3,
                    pointRadius: 4
                };
            });

            if(comparatorChartInstance) comparatorChartInstance.destroy();

            comparatorChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'line',
                data: { labels: YEARS, datasets: datasets },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false,
                    interaction: { mode: 'index', intersect: false },
                    scales: { y: { beginAtZero: false } }
                }
            });

            // Actualizar tabla comparativa
            const tbody = document.getElementById('comp-table-body');
            tbody.innerHTML = '';
            selectedCompetitors.forEach(cif => {
                const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
                const s20 = comp.sales[2020] || 0;
                const s24 = comp.sales[2024] || 0;
                const growth = s20 > 0 ? ((s24 - s20)/s20 * 100).toFixed(1) : 0;
                const cagr = calcCAGR(s20, s24, 4);
                
                const row = `
                    <tr class="border-b border-slate-700">
                        <td class="px-4 py-2 font-bold text-white truncate max-w-xs">${comp.name}</td>
                        <td class="px-4 py-2 text-right text-slate-500">${fmtNum(s20)}</td>
                        <td class="px-4 py-2 text-right font-bold text-slate-300">${fmtNum(s24)}</td>
                        <td class="px-4 py-2 text-right text-blue-400 font-bold">${cagr}%</td>
                        <td class="px-4 py-2 text-right ${growth >= 0 ? 'text-emerald-400' : 'text-rose-400'} font-bold">${growth}%</td>
                    </tr>
                `;
                tbody.innerHTML += row;
            });
        }

        // --- MODAL ---
        function openModal(cif) {
            const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
            if(!comp) return;

            document.getElementById('modal').classList.remove('hidden');
            document.getElementById('modal-cif').innerText = comp.cif;
            document.getElementById('modal-name').innerText = comp.name;
            
            const s20 = comp.sales[2020] || 0;
            const s24 = comp.sales[2024] || 0;
            const growth = s20 > 0 ? ((s24 - s20)/s20 * 100).toFixed(1) + '%' : '-';
            const cagr = calcCAGR(s20, s24, 4) + '%';
            
            document.getElementById('modal-sales-24').innerText = fmtNum(s24);
            document.getElementById('modal-growth').innerText = growth;
            document.getElementById('modal-cagr').innerText = cagr;
            document.getElementById('modal-cost').innerText = fmtEur(s24 * 239000);

            const ctx = document.getElementById('modalChart').getContext('2d');
            if(modalChartInstance) modalChartInstance.destroy();

            modalChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'line',
                data: {
                    labels: YEARS,
                    datasets: [{
                        label: 'Ventas (GWh)',
                        data: YEARS.map(y => comp.sales[y]||0),
                        borderColor: '#2563eb',
                        backgroundColor: 'rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1)',
                        fill: true,
                        tension: 0.4
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false,
                    plugins: { legend: { display: false } },
                    scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true } }
                }
            });
        }

        function closeModal() {
            document.getElementById('modal').classList.add('hidden');
        }

        // --- CARGA DE DATOS CSV ---
        const dropZone = document.getElementById('drop-zone');
        const fileInput = document.getElementById('file-input');

        dropZone.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dropZone.classList.add('border-emerald-500'); });
        dropZone.addEventListener('dragleave', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dropZone.classList.remove('border-emerald-500'); });
        dropZone.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
            e.preventDefault();
            dropZone.classList.remove('border-emerald-500');
            handleFiles(e.dataTransfer.files);
        });
        fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => handleFiles(e.target.files));

        async function handleFiles(files) {
            const fileList = document.getElementById('file-list');
            fileList.innerHTML = '';
            
            let newDB = new Map();
            DB.forEach(c => newDB.set(c.cif, c));

            for (let i = 0; i < files.length; i++) {
                const file = files[i];
                let year = null;
                if(file.name.includes('2019')) year = 2019;
                else if(file.name.includes('2020')) year = 2020;
                else if(file.name.includes('2021')) year = 2021;
                else if(file.name.includes('2022')) year = 2022;
                else if(file.name.includes('2023')) year = 2023;
                else if(file.name.includes('2024')) year = 2024;

                if (year) {
                    const text = await file.text();
                    const lines = text.split('\n');
                    
                    lines.forEach((line, idx) => {
                        if(idx === 0 || !line.trim()) return; 
                        const parts = line.split(';'); 
                        if(parts.length >= 3) {
                            let cif = parts[0].replace(/"/g, '').trim().toUpperCase();
                            let name = parts[1].replace(/"/g, '').trim();
                            let salesStr = parts[2].replace(/"/g, '').trim().replace('.','').replace(',','.'); 
                            let sales = parseFloat(salesStr) || 0;

                            if(!newDB.has(cif)) newDB.set(cif, { cif, name, sales: {} });
                            let entry = newDB.get(cif);
                            entry.sales[year] = sales;
                            if(name.length > entry.name.length) entry.name = name; 
                        }
                    });

                    fileList.innerHTML += `<div class="text-sm text-emerald-400"><i class="fa fa-check"></i> ${file.name} procesado (${year})</div>`;
                }
            }

            DB = Array.from(newDB.values());
            renderDashboard(); 
            alert('Datos actualizados correctamente. Total empresas: ' + DB.length);
        }

        // Init
        renderDashboard();

    </script>
</body>
</html>
